casebody.data:
No. 10-546. Atlantic Richfield Company, et al., Petitioners v. Santa Clara County, California, et al. 562 U.S. 1169, 131 S. Ct. 920, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 182.

178 L. Ed. 2d 804,

January 10, 2011.

Motion of Atlantic Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of California denied.

Same case below, 50 Cal. 4th 35, 112 Cal. Rptr. 3d 697, 235 P.3d 21.
